Html:
For anybody who wants to hack on PDFsharp using git, I've git-svn clone'd the CodePlex subversion repository and published it on gitorious.org, where you can check it and/or publish your own branches:

http://gitorious.org/pdfsharp

 

Obviously the CodePlex subversion repo is the canonical copy.  I will try to keep the gitorious copy up to date with it, and it will never contain changes that aren't upstream (though individuals' branches/clones may, of course).
